Name: Black Junimo
Description: Five parts vodka to two parts coffee liqueur.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Cinco partes de vodka, dos partes de licor de café.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 두 잔의 커피 리큐어에 다섯 잔의 보드카.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Fünf CL von Wodka zu zwei CL Kaffeelikör.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Cinq parts de vodka, deux parts de liqueur de café.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Cinco partes de vodka e duas de licor de café.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Пять частей водки на две части кофейного ликера.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Beş parça vodkaya iki parça kahve likörü.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 黑色祝尼魔。五份伏特加两份咖啡利口酒。
